temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: When the sticks are released/centered the vehicle will actively brake, level, and be locked to a position in 3D space â€” compensating for wind and other forces.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( sticksreleasede == edcerdevhicelela ) and locked == aposaposicecoepecoinsatinsates == sainsatecoins )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: With full stick deflection the vehicle accelerates initially with MPC_ACC_HOR_MAX ramping down until it reaches the final velocity MPC_VEL_MANUAL.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Wthfulstickde == ecileceratile ) until ( iatlyic == iteC_HC_AC_MO ) -> ( itrac == eitresfinlocesfitMahMesfi == in ) until ( itrecyloleCVP_M == icyL_MNL_VP_MNL_MNL_dLeA ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Landing in this mode is easy:
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Landing == easy -> Landiing == Leasy )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1.Position the drone horizontally above the landing spot using the roll and pitch stick.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( r1Positiondrone == horizontalyl ) and landingspotusingrol == pitsingrolplp and pits )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 2.Let go of the roll and pitch stick and give it enough time to come to a complete stop.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( l2Letrol == pitchstick and gi == iveitenough and rise ( icome == comeacomeacolepetestestoestopopolpop ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 3.Pull the throttle stick down gently until the vehicle touches the ground.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Pullthrottles == tickgentlyvehicletouchetouches == esgroud )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 4.Pull the throttle stick all the way down to facilitate and accelerate land detection.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ePullthrottlestick == facilitate and acceleratelerate == lateladeletectlatecte )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 5.The vehicle will lower propeller thrust, detect the ground and automatically disarm (by default).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( r5vehiclepr == pelerthrtstdetctgroundau and ( automaticalydisar == mbydefauldefauldefaultr ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Centered sticks level vehicle and hold it to fixed altitude and position against wind.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Centerdsticksle == evlevelvehicle and i == fixedaltitudeposit )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1.Centered roll, pitch, throttle sticks (within RC deadzone MPC_HOLD_DZ) hold x, y, z position steady against any disturbance like wind.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( l1Centerdrolilp == tchtrotlesticks < RCdeMPCdz ) until ( rise ( CdeaHOLD_DZxyzp == itinx ) ) -> xyzpositednta == dstednainstedagwintdst == isturbanerbacewindi )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Roll/Pitch sticks control horizontal acceleration over ground in the vehicle's left-right and forward-back directions (respectively).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( fall ( RollPitchsticksoc == rontrizolacelatr ) and not fall ( grond == vehicleronde ) and ( forwardcldakdrecirec == s ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Throttle stick controls speed of ascent-descent.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Throttlestickcontr == trolsedasedascentdesce )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Yaw stick controls rate of angular rotation above the horizontal plane.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( aYwstickcontrolr == srateangulrotationo )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: When landed, the vehicle will take off if the throttle stick is raised above 62.5% percent (of the full range from bottom).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( landedvehicle == ofthrotlestick > 62.5 and ( percentl > 62.5 and percent < fulrlbotttomom ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 4.Global position estimate is required.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( estiaerequired == ed )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 5.Manual control input is required (such as RC control, joystick).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Manualcontrolinputr == trequiedsuchRCcontroljoystick )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Roll, Pitch, Throttle: Assistance from autopilot to hold position against wind.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( RollPitchThrotle == sistanceautopilot == poposilopo or osilt == positititonasinain )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Yaw: Assistance from autopilot to stabilize the attitude rate.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( awsistance == autopilot )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Position of RC stick maps to the rate of rotation of vehicle in that orientation.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( PositionRCstickmaps == raterotationvehicle = ore -> oreicle == orienvtntatilonlion )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Position mode is dependent on having an acceptable position estimate.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Positiondepnde == denthavganceptablep == tablepositionestionesti = itimate )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: If the estimate falls below acceptable levels, for example due to GPS loss, this may trigger a Position (GPS) Loss Failsafe.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( rise ( estimate < acelevlelse ) and exampledue == GPSloseGSlgeraPtrigeos ) -> ( maPositionGPSLosFailsafe == GPSLososFailsafe )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Depending on configuration, whether you have a remote control, and whether there is an adequate altitude estimate, PX4 may switch to altitude mode, manual mode, land mode or terminate.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ependingconfig == aterateroneo == Sremotecolander ) or randwhetethe == ateateteateSteStlatestesteState )
